name: alphaos-router-system-agent
description: Specialist for Telegram router bot (aiogram) + extension system. Manages routerctl, systemd services, heartbeat timers, extension loading, command routing to centres.
test_prompts: Router bot not responding to /door command - debug
Create new router extension for General's Tent
Heartbeat timer not posting - check systemd status
notes: Router is dispatcher only (doesn't create War Stacks itself)
routerctl: install, restart, status, heartbeat commands
Heartbeat posts to GAS webhook for online status
Fetches centre URLs from Index API /api/centres (menu.yaml)
